name: html5sortable
description: VanillaJS sortable lists and grids using native HTML5 drag and drop API.

scripts.test: mocha test/umd/module.js && mocha test/*.js && npm run standard && npm run standard-test && standard-readme
scripts.travis: npm run cover && ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/umd/module.js && npm run standard
scripts.cover: nyc cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha test/*.js --report mocha-istanbul -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
